title: Dr Seuss on the loose: the Zax
creator_credit: Hawley Pratt, Isadore Freleng, Ted Geisel, CBS TV and DePatie-Freleng Enterprises
brief_description: A north-going Zax and a south-going Zax meet face-to-face on their journeys and neither is willing to budge. Their stubbornness and inability to change are presented most humorously in this animated film based on the original illustrations.
